command: dd if=/dev/sda bs=512 skip=1 count=1 of=/var/tmp/gpt_primary.bin && diff -u <(sha256sum /var/tmp/gpt_primary.bin | awk '{print $1}') <(sha256sum baseline/gpt_primary.bin | awk '{print $1}')
explanation: Extracts the primary GPT header (LBA 1) and compares its hash to a baseline, validating whether the partition map metadata has been altered.
rationale_steps: Use dd to read the primary GPT header from LBA 1.
Compute SHA-256 checksums for the current and baseline headers.
Diff the hashes to determine if the GPT metadata was modified.
